entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 80 %

Dewpoint: -16.5°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
